description: Created website interface using Tailwind. Selasar Kampus is an Education Technology Start-Up Based in Indonesia created from anxiety about the education system in Indonesia which only cares about students graduating with satisfactory grades without seeing and helping whether the student is suitable for the major they chose or not.
Created web using Bootstrap and CodeIgniter. Covid Buddy is a nonprofit platform to give support and reliable information about COVID-19 in Surabaya.
